title: Beyond the Orange Moon
description: Sometimes fate strikes in unexpected ways.Lucy Dalton was tired of living a life she didn't want. Charlie Mathews was living the life he always wanted.But one night, fate changes the course of their lives forever. A year later, Lucy and Charlie's paths meet again, igniting a spark that neither can deny.Lucy knows he doesn't remember her, but she's already in too deep.Charlie knows the unwritten family rule: Mathews men never admit when they're broken.Can they leave the past where it belongs and find a way to look beyond the orange moon?
author: Adrienne Frances
